from devicemanufacture a where 1 = 1
a.Name like '%$queryParam$%' OR a.Nickname like '%$queryParam$%'

SELECT Count(*) FROM devicemanufacture a WHERE 1 = 1
a.Name like '%$queryParam$%' OR a.Nickname like '%$queryParam$%'
